text:
Piece of the day: BCASE - magnetic wire organizer from Xiaomi
04 Nov 2019, 15:15 by Daria Gromova
It costs only 250 rubles and is already available on AliExpress.
Life hacker often talks about the latest Xiaomi, and these are not always smartphones or smart home appliances. For example, on AliExpress you can already order Mijia BCASE - a stylish and miniature accessory that will solve the problem of tangled wires once and for all. Simply fasten the clip-on clip onto the cable and hook it onto the magnetic stand when not in use.



A small holder and three magnetic nozzles on the wire are included. Two of them can only be attached to the stand, the third is suitable for use separately. You can even hang keys on it.



BCASE costs only 247 rubles, delivery to Russia is free. Two colors are available: cherry wood and walnut.
